articles.title: Europe on the brink: the states battling to stave off recession - The Guardian

articles.title: Russia's Gazprom says key gas pipeline to Europe will shut down for 'routine maintenance' - CBC News
articles.description: A key Russian natural gas pipeline will shut down for three days of maintenance at the end of this month, the state-owned energy company Gazprom announced Friday, raising economic pressure on Germany and other European countries that depend on the fuel to pow…
